Working with Gaussian  (Normal) Distribution
Coding in R:
```{r}
# Define r.v. X, its PDF and CDF
x <- seq(-5, 5, length.out = 1000)
pdf <- dnorm(x, mean=0, sd=1)
cdf <- pnorm(x, mean=0, sd=1)

# Plotting PDF and CDF
par(mfrow=c(1, 2))
plot(x, pdf, type="l", col="blue", lwd=2,
     main="Standard Noraml PDF",
     xlab="x", ylab="Density")
grid()



plot(x, cdf, type="l", col="red", lwd=2,
     main="Standard Normal CDF",
     xlab="x", ylab="Probability")

grid()

```

Coding in Python:
```{python}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt 
from scipy.stats import norm

# Define r.v. X its PDF and CDF
x = np.linspace(-5, 5, 1000)

pdf = norm.pdf(x, 0, 1)
cdf = norm.cdf(x, 0, 1)

# Plotting PDF and CDF
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 5))
plt.subplot(1, 2, 1)
plt.plot(x, pdf, 'b', label="PDF")
plt.title("Standard Normal PDF")
plt.xlabel("X")
plt.ylabel("Density")
plt.grid(True)
plt.legend()


plt.subplot(1, 2, 2)
plt.plot(x, cdf, 'r', label="CDF")
plt.title("Standard Normal CDF")
plt.xlabel("x")
plt.ylabel("Probability")
plt.grid(True)
plt.legend()

plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
```

### Common Probability Distributions in R

| Distribution | PDF/PMF | CDF | Quantile | Random |
|--------------|---------|-----|----------|--------|
| Normal       | `dnorm`   | `pnorm`   | `qnorm`   | `rnorm`   |
| Uniform      | `dunif`   | `punif`   | `qunif`   | `runif`   |
| Exponential  | `dexp`    | `pexp`    | `qexp`    | `rexp`    |
| Poisson      | `dpois`   | `ppois`   | `qpois`   | `rpois`   |
| Binomial     | `dbinom`  | `pbinom`  | `qbinom`  | `rbinom`  |
| Chi-squared  | `dchisq`  | `pchisq`  | `qchisq`  | `rchisq`  |
| Student-t    | `dt`      | `pt`      | `qt`      | `rt`      |
| F            | `df`      | `pf`      | `qf`      | `rf`      |
| Gamma        | `dgamma`  | `pgamma`  | `qgamma`  | `rgamma`  |
| Beta         | `dbeta`   | `pbeta`   | `qbeta`   | `rbeta`   |



### Common Probability Distributions in Python (scipy.stats)

| Distribution | PDF/PMF        | CDF           | Quantile (ppf) | Random (rvs) |
|--------------|----------------|---------------|----------------|--------------|
| Normal       | `norm.pdf`     | `norm.cdf`    | `norm.ppf`     | `norm.rvs`   |
| Uniform      | `uniform.pdf`  | `uniform.cdf` | `uniform.ppf`  | `uniform.rvs`|
| Exponential  | `expon.pdf`    | `expon.cdf`   | `expon.ppf`    | `expon.rvs`  |
| Poisson      | `poisson.pmf`  | `poisson.cdf` | `poisson.ppf`  | `poisson.rvs`|
| Binomial     | `binom.pmf`    | `binom.cdf`   | `binom.ppf`    | `binom.rvs`  |
| Chi-squared  | `chi2.pdf`     | `chi2.cdf`    | `chi2.ppf`     | `chi2.rvs`   |
| Student-t    | `t.pdf`        | `t.cdf`       | `t.ppf`        | `t.rvs`      |
| F            | `f.pdf`        | `f.cdf`       | `f.ppf`        | `f.rvs`      |
| Gamma        | `gamma.pdf`    | `gamma.cdf`   | `gamma.ppf`    | `gamma.rvs`  |
| Beta         | `beta.pdf`     | `beta.cdf`    | `beta.ppf`     | `beta.rvs`   |
